name: Ascend (itch) (djmick254)
description:
Ascend to the top collecting coins, bouncing on mushrooms, and avoiding rewind blocks in this game made for the Brackeys Game Jame 2020.2! 

The game was made in about 30 hours over 6 days, and all art, code, music, and sound effects were created by me.

Engine: Godot

Art: Procreate

Png Files to Spritesheets: TexturePacker

Music: Beepbox

Sound Effects: bfxr
